title: Real-time Chat E2E Test Suite
description: End-to-end test suite for a real-time chat application, focusing on authentication, messaging, and offline scenarios.
challenges: Testing asynchronous WebSocket behavior and handling race conditions in real-time messaging. Implemented custom wait strategies instead of brittle timeouts.

title: Hybrid Selenium Automation Framework
description: Scalable Selenium automation framework using Page Object Model with CI integration for regression testing.
challenges: Ensuring thread-safe execution during parallel runs and maintaining readable test reports as the test suite scaled.

title: REST Assured API Testing Framework
tech: REST Assured, Cucumber, Java, Maven, GitHub Actions
description: BDD-driven API testing framework for Google Maps-style Place API with complete CRUD operation coverage and automated reporting.
features: Cucumber HTML reporting with Maven plugin
challenges: Managing test data across multiple scenarios while maintaining test independence. Implemented hooks for setup/teardown and static place_id management to ensure clean state between tests.
